parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

datasetStructure: One record per device tracking event

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, or combination of identifiers).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTSEQ

datasetVariables.description: May be any valid number. Should be unique within each SPDEVID.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DTSEQ

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTTERM

self.title: Reported Term for the Tracking Event

datasetVariables.description: Example: Shipped, Returned, Installed, Implanted, Explanted
datasetVariables.label: Reported Term for the Tracking Event
datasetVariables.name: DTTERM

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTMODIFY

datasetVariables.description: If DTTERM is modified to facilitate coding, then DTMODIFY will contain the modified text.
datasetVariables.label: Modified Reported Term
datasetVariables.name: DTMODIFY

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTDECOD

datasetVariables.description: If an external controlled terminology is used, the name and version of the dictionary used to map terms must be provided in a Define.XML ExternalCodeList element.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Tracking Term
datasetVariables.name: DTDECOD

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTPARTY

datasetVariables.description: Describes the person or organization that is accountable for the device defined in DTTERM. For example: if DTTERM = SHIPPED, DTPARTY would contain the transfer recipient, e.g., SITE. If DTTERM = IMPLANTED then DTPARTY would contain SUBJECT.
datasetVariables.label: Party Responsible  for the Device
datasetVariables.name: DTPARTY

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTPRTYID

datasetVariables.description: The value of the responsible party identified in DTPARTY. For example, if DTPARTY is SUBJECT, DTPRTYID would contain the subject number.
datasetVariables.label: Responsible Party Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DTPRTYID

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTCAT

datasetVariables.description: Examples: categorize by tracking event type, for example, DOMESTIC vs. INTERNATIONAL
datasetVariables.label: Category for Device Tracking Event
datasetVariables.name: DTCAT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of the event.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Device Tracking Event
datasetVariables.name: DTSCAT

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTDTC

self.title: Date/Time of Device Tracking Event Collection

datasetVariables.description: Will generally be the same as the date the tracking event started, but it can differ.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Device Tracking Event Collection
datasetVariables.name: DTDTC

parentProduct.title: SDTM Implementation Guide for Medical Devices SDTMIG-MD 1.0 (Provisional)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DT.DTSTDTC

self.title: Start Date/Time of Device Tracking Event

datasetVariables.description: A tracking event (e.g., SHIPPED, RECEIVED) is usually a point in time, which is why only the start date/time is included.  If an event occurs over a longer period, the stop date/time may be included from the SDTM model.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Device Tracking Event
datasetVariables.name: DTSTDTC

description: A events domain that contains the logistics and disposition information specific to a given device. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102621, 2018-06-29)
label: Device Tracking and Disposition
name: DT
